What it is: Maps out your most emotionally impactful moments as symbolic scars across a temporal body.
How to use it: List pivotal events. Ask AI to place each as a symbolic scar on a metaphorical timeline-body.
What it changes: Creates a tangible model of psychological endurance.

What it is: Detects the paths you abandoned or feared and symbolically retrieves their essence.
How to use it: Describe regrets or missed chances. Ask AI to extract what vitality still lives in them.
What it changes: Restores agency by reintegrating fragmented identity.

What it is: Embeds your instinctual signals into a symbolic navigation system.
How to use it: Describe how you sense yes/no decisions. Ask AI to convert those into mythic compass cues.
What it changes: Aligns decision-making with internal navigation logic.

What it is: Breaks down the symbolic purpose of compulsive behaviors.
How to use it: Describe a habit or pattern. Ask AI what unmet symbolic need it tries to fulfill.
What it changes: Turns shame into self-insight and redirection.

What it is: Identifies where you keep returning to old versions of yourself instead of evolving.
How to use it: Describe moments of regression. Ask AI to diagnose the symbolic resurrection pattern.
What it changes: Interrupts psychic recursion and fosters actual growth.

What it is: Converts family history into symbolic lineage traits.
How to use it: Describe your ancestors. Ask AI to interpret them as mythic roles in a symbolic genealogy.
What it changes: Distills personal heritage into empowering archetypes.

What it is: Reveals what ‘emotional currency’ your shadow self trades in.
How to use it: Ask AI: ‘What does my shadow use to get its needs met behind my back?’
What it changes: Clarifies the economy of self-sabotage and re-routes its energy.

What it is: Constructs a timeline of perceived betrayals and the symbolic contracts broken.
How to use it: List all moments of betrayal. Ask AI to extract what inner contracts were really being violated.
What it changes: Helps renegotiate trust structures and inner agreements.

What it is: Builds a symbolic survival manual based on the traits that kept you alive.
How to use it: Describe your harshest moments. Ask AI what mythic skillset helped you endure.
What it changes: Reclaims survival as a heroic legacy, not pathology.

What it is: Draws a climate map of your inner life using emotional symbolism.
How to use it: List emotions over a day or week. Ask AI to render them as symbolic meteorological phenomena.
What it changes: Externalizes emotional data into visual symbolic form.
